name: Community Team Sponsor
description: Name-only jersey sponsorship for one or more teams.
benefits: Sponsor NAME (not logo) on each player jersey for sponsored team(s)
Sponsor name on each sponsored team webpage
Sponsor listing on AGSA sponsor page
1 Instagram Story thank-you during season windows
Tax receipt with 501(c)(3) EIN
fulfillmentRequirements: Submit sponsor display name by deadline for jersey and webpage placement.

name: Multi-Team Sponsor
description: Name-only package for sponsors committing to 2-4 teams.
benefits: Everything in Community Team Sponsor for each team
1 Instagram feed post thank-you (plus Stories)
Featured placement above standard team sponsors on sponsor page
Tax receipt with 501(c)(3) EIN
fulfillmentRequirements: Submit sponsor display name and team preference list before deadline.

name: League Partner
description: League-wide premium visibility with banner and recurring social recognition.
benefits: 2x4 banner placement at Barcroft Field 3 for one year
Prominent placement in top sponsor page section
Quarterly Instagram sponsor spotlights (4 feed posts/year)
Monthly Instagram Story mention during active season windows
Optional Presented by callout for one clinic or event (if applicable)
Tax receipt with 501(c)(3) EIN
fulfillmentRequirements: Provide sponsor name and optional logo package for digital placements by deadline.

name: Division Logo Sponsor
description: Top tier with exclusive division-wide jersey logo rights.
benefits: EXCLUSIVE: only tier that allows jersey logo placement
Division-wide jersey logo placement across 8-10 teams
Sponsor logo/name on every team webpage in sponsored division
2x4 banner placement at Barcroft Field 3 for one year
Featured hero placement on sponsor page
2 Instagram feed spotlights + 6 Instagram Story mentions across the year
Optional Division Sponsor naming language where appropriate
Tax receipt with 501(c)(3) EIN
fulfillmentRequirements: Upload vector logo files and brand usage guidance by deadline.
